name: com.fixer33.observable-variables
description:
This custom Unity package is designed to provide a simple API to simplify sharing global variables throughout your project without creating infinite Singleton objects.

It also implements Observable pattern by sharing ValueChanged event to avoid constant reading the value from Update loop.

samples.description: Contains sample showing how observable variables are serialized if used as a serialized field
Shows how to create custom observable variable for the type you need
Shows how to create custom observable variable for the type you need. And introduce a drawer for variable browser window
